verses.1:
Mila fo madio aho ry Tompoko,
Fo mazava tsy misy pentina re;
Fotsy toy ilay Anao tahaka
Ny oram-panala e!
'Zany no iriko hatao amiko.
verses.2:
Mila fitia ampy aho, ry Tompoko
Ary hery ampy sady betsaka;
Vonona hamaly izay
Antsonao ka tsy ho reraka:
Io no fo tokony hananako.
verses.3:
Aoka hiredareda aho Tompoko,
Ho fanahy feno herin-danitra,
Ho saina sy Tanana
Hanao izay sitrakao rehetra,
Hampiely izay noraisiko
